name: Gramma's Recipe
description:
Gramma's Recipe is an open-RPG that plays out in a "Make your own story" kind of style. It features complete freedom of exploration and the objectives can be completed in any order. The order you complete objectives will cause the game to play out in different ways.

The game was made using a "Shell" concept which gives players complete freedom of play within the boundaries of the world. The game will last 2-4 hours depending on how you play; speedrunning can allow for completion times as low as 25 minutes!

Want to contact us? deadantelopesgo@yahoo.com
